cw-log-analyzer.title: Log Analyzer with CloudWatch Logs
cw-log-analyzer.description: Use when debugging or investigating issues that would likely benefit from CloudWatch log introspection. Search and filter CloudWatch Logs, find error patterns, and correlate log events across multiple services.

pg-postgres-mcp-ro.title: PostgreSQL MCP Pro (Read-Only)
pg-postgres-mcp-ro.description: PostgreSQL tuning and analysis server. Provides index tuning, explain plans, health checks, and safe SQL execution. Read-only with resource limits.

pg-postgres-mcp-rw.title: PostgreSQL MCP Pro (Read-Write)
pg-postgres-mcp-rw.description: PostgreSQL tuning and analysis server. Provides index tuning, explain plans, health checks, and safe SQL execution. Full read/write access for development.
